listing_by_key.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.pvt_activation_key, {'user': doc.pvt_user, 'account': doc.pvt_account, '_rev': doc._rev, '_id': doc._id}); }

group_by_realm.map: function(doc) { if(doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit( doc.pvt_account.realm, doc._id ); }
group_by_realm.reduce: function(key, values, rereduce) { if (rereduce) return values; else return values[0]; }
